Key Match Events: Sacramento Kings extended their winning streak to a season-high five games
DeMar DeRozan scored nine of Sacramento’s 11 points in the second overtime
Jaime Jaquez Jr.’s missed free throws in the first overtime
Tyler Herro’s costly 8-second violation late in the fourth quarter
Post-Match Reflections: Heat head coach Erik Spoelstra said, 'There will be a breakthrough. We’re going to learn from these tough games. We’ve had some tough ones. We all feel it… what you do is you go into it. You lean into the pain & learn from these tough Ls & fight for that breakthrough.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The defeat marked Miami’s third consecutive loss
Jaquez recorded his first career triple-double with 16 points, 12 rebounds, and 10 assists
Others: DeMar DeRozan led Miami with 26 points
Bam Adebayo’s shooting struggles continued as he managed just 6-of-19 from the field
